item.description:
Come CELEBRATE your most sacred, sensual self! Join us for our monthly yoga ritual by candlelight - clothing optional (the second Sat of every month). Deepen your pratice, expand intimace with yourself and others and Discover freedom from shame, guilt and suffering and move closer to love, bliss and divine truth. The simple act of removing our clothes enables us to break away from limiting body and belief patterns and identities. All shapes and sizes welcome as we celebrate the divinty of the temple we have entered into this life with.

"Naked yoga is about accepting the totality of the form of the body and immersing into the ecstasy and absolute potential of the body soul union. Unlike other spiritual philosophies, practices or traditions that work to transcend the body, this practice celebrates the body fully with reverence, joy and abandon." - Isis Phoenix, Sensual Shaman, NYC
www.nakedyoganyc.com

7pm - E3 Live Shots & Live Fudge Tasting
7:30-8:30pm - Yoga Class - clothing optional
8:30-9pm - Guided Full Body Meditation

Cost: $15 members, $20 non-members

*Infrared Sauna will be available from 6:30-7:30pm for no additional charge

Please bring your own mat , towel or blanket
item.name: Naked Yoga by Candlelight - by popular demand
